name: Palette.fm
description: Palette.fm is an AI-powered tool that colorizes black-and-white photos and videos with realistic and customizable results.
longDescription: Palette.fm is an innovative AI-powered platform designed to transform black-and-white images and videos into vibrant, colorized versions with high accuracy. Its mission is to make photo and video restoration accessible to everyone, from casual users reviving family memories to professionals enhancing archival content. The platform leverages advanced machine learning to automatically apply realistic colors, while also offering customization options for fine-tuning results. It serves a wide range of users, including photographers, historians, and content creators, by providing an intuitive interface and high-quality outputs. Palette.fm eliminates the need for complex software or manual colorization, streamlining the process for both personal and professional projects. The service also supports bulk processing and API integration for advanced use cases.
features: AI-powered colorization automatically adds realistic colors to black-and-white photos and videos, saving time and effort.
Over 21 color filters allow users to select styles that match their artistic vision or historical context.
Customizable text prompts enable users to fine-tune colors for specific objects or moods in the image.
High-resolution outputs support up to 4K quality for professional-grade results without watermarks on paid plans.
Bulk processing capabilities allow users to colorize multiple images simultaneously, ideal for large collections.
Video colorization transforms black-and-white footage into vibrant, lifelike videos for modern viewing.
API support enables developers to integrate Palette.fm’s colorization technology into their own applications.
User-friendly interface requires no sign-up for basic use, making it accessible to beginners and experts alike.

faqs.question: What is Palette.fm used for?
faqs.answer: Palette.fm is an AI tool that colorizes black-and-white photos and videos, making it ideal for restoring old family photos, historical archives, or creating vibrant content for social media.

faqs.question: Is Palette.fm free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Palette.fm offers a free plan with unlimited previews, one free trial credit, and watermarked images at 500x500 resolution, with paid plans for higher quality and watermark-free outputs.

faqs.question: Can I customize the colors applied to my photos?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can adjust colors using text prompts or select from over 21 filters to achieve the desired look.

faqs.question: Does Palette.fm support video colorization?
faqs.answer: Yes, Palette.fm can colorize black-and-white videos, transforming them into vibrant, colored footage suitable for various applications.

faqs.question: Do I need to create an account to use Palette.fm?
faqs.answer: No account is required for basic features, but signing up allows users to save their work and access premium features.

faqs.question: How accurate is Palette.fm’s colorization?
faqs.answer: While not 100% historically accurate, Palette.fm uses advanced AI to produce realistic colors, with options to refine results for better accuracy.

faqs.question: Can Palette.fm be used for professional projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, Palette.fm is trusted by professionals, including those working with Netflix and Disney, for high-quality photo and video colorization.

faqs.question: What file formats does Palette.fm support?
faqs.answer: Palette.fm supports popular image formats like JPEG, PNG, and BMP for uploads.
